segments.text: I notice the boy stretching for the cookie jar, completely unaware of how dangerous his position is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and he’s balancing on his tiptoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is encouraging him, which makes it even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned around to see what the kids are doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the counter, and she doesn’t even react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is a scene from a comedy, but it’s actually kind of terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and the girl is just going to stand there and watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just turn off the faucet and stop this madness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
